name: Micro(game)management
description:
This is my submission for Mini Jam 106 where the limitation is "Limited Time".

You only have ten minutes to e-mail your boss, but you also need to deal with a virus that deletes some of your progress if you don't clear its pop-up games in time! You better have a fast typing speed and reaction time in this Warioware-inspired typing game! (Disclaimer: The files on your computer will NOT be deleted by this game, only the progress of your current in-game sentence. Any resemblance to real computer viruses or malware are purely coincidental. That being said, please be safe online , and be careful of what you download from unfamiliar sites.)

  • CONTROLS:
    • Your Entire Keyboard: Well it is a typing game, so... yeah.
    • Escape: Quit the game.
    • Mouse + Left Click: Interact with pop-up windows.
